question: Kya aap Annual Dinner mein shamil honay walay hain?
funFact: Fun Fact: Yeh shaam dosto ke saath yaadon bhari hogi, is liye isko miss mat karna!

question: Kya aap ek shaandar aur yaadon bhari raat enjoy karna chahtay hain?
funFact: Fun Fact: Yeh sirf ek dinner nahi, balki ek IT students ki grand party hai!

question: Aap Annual Dinner mein sab se zyada kis cheez ka intezar kar rahe hain?
funFact: Fun Fact: Annual Dinner sirf ek meal nahi, balki ek experience hai jo aap hamesha yaad rakhein ge!

question: Kya aap apni IT life se ek chhoti break lena chahtay hain aur masti karna chahtay hain?
funFact: Fun Fact: Kabhi kabhi code ki duniya se nikal kar real duniya mein enjoy karna bhi zaroori hota hai!

question: Agar aap ek game khel sakain Annual Dinner pe, to woh konsi hogi?
funFact: Fun Fact: IT students ki creativity coding tak nahi rukti, memes aur games mein bhi full fun!

question: Are you participating in any event in the Annual Dinner? If yes, please specify which one! And also share your Excitement
funFact: Great to know you are excited for the events!
